snippet.title: CERN finds new particle that may be the Higgs Boson
snippet.description: CERN reports a new particle is the heaviest boson ever discovered. Get more details about this major breakthrough in particle physics.

snippet.title: Large Hadron Collider creates powerful collision
snippet.description: On March 30, 2010, scientists at CERN working on the Large Hadron Collider (LHC) successfully collided two proton beams operating at 3.5 TeV.

snippet.title: Restarting the Large Hadron Collider after a 14-month hiatus
snippet.description: Scientists at CERN recently restarted the experiments at the Large Hadron Collider (LHC). These experiment may help us understand the origins of the universe, what the base particl...

snippet.title: Geek Trivia: Data with destiny
snippet.description: What is the projected rate of data production for the Large Hadron Collider?
